initial_expr: ∀ (input : List Int) (x y : Nat) (hx : x < input.length) (hy : y < input.length) (hxy : x < y) (h_same : (pileAssignment input)[x]! = (pileAssignment input)[y]!), input[x]! ≥ input[y]!

proof_steps.tactic: intro input x y hx hy hxy h_same
have hp_y : p = (pileAssignment input)[y]! := by rw [hp_x, h_same]
have h_y_at_state : (pileAssignment input)[y]! = binarySearchGE (stateAtStep input y).piles input[y]! := pileAssignment_at_state input y hy
have h_x_at_state : (pileAssignment input)[x]! = binarySearchGE (stateAtStep input x).piles input[x]! := pileAssignment_at_state input x hx
have h_p_eq_bs : p = binarySearchGE (stateAtStep input x).piles input[x]! := by rw [hp_x, h_x_at_state]
have h_p_le_size_x : p ≤ (stateAtStep input x).piles.size := by rw [h_p_eq_bs]; exact binarySearchGE_le_size (stateAtStep input x).piles input[x]! (stateAtStep_pilesSorted input x)

tactic_history: intro input x y hx hy hxy h_same
have hp_y : p = (pileAssignment input)[y]! := by rw [hp_x, h_same]
have h_y_at_state : (pileAssignment input)[y]! = binarySearchGE (stateAtStep input y).piles input[y]! := pileAssignment_at_state input y hy
have h_x_at_state : (pileAssignment input)[x]! = binarySearchGE (stateAtStep input x).piles input[x]! := pileAssignment_at_state input x hx
have h_p_eq_bs : p = binarySearchGE (stateAtStep input x).piles input[x]! := by rw [hp_x, h_x_at_state]
have h_p_le_size_x : p ≤ (stateAtStep input x).piles.size := by rw [h_p_eq_bs]; exact binarySearchGE_le_size (stateAtStep input x).piles input[x]! (stateAtStep_pilesSorted input x)
